document_data.name: ''Collar of Protection''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Collars of protection''''' were [[enchanted]] [[collar (animal)|collars]] created to keep pets of the wealthy individuals safe. They were first created by a [[wizard]] from [[Ravens Bluff]] sometime before the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: ''Collars of protection'' were made out of various types of materials, from simple [[leather]] thongs to lavishly decorated collars of [[gem]]s, furs, and [[chain]]s.
document_data.Powers: These collars were only of diminutive size, only big enough to be worn by various pets or creatures of a [[human]], [[halfling]], [[gnome]] size, or smaller. They also only extended protection to creatures of low animal intelligence. Defensive enchantments of these items carried from ''+1'' to ''+5''.
